machine_start_gcode.default_value:
SET_LED LED=WS2812 RED=0 GREEN=0.1 BLUE=0.2; color teal
 M140 S{material_bed_temperature_layer_0}     ; set bed temperature and continue
 M104 S{material_print_temperature_layer_0}   ; set hot end temperature and continue
 M106 S190; fan on for correct PID
 G4  P3000 ; wait 3 sec
 G28 ; Home all axes
 G1 Z40 F300 ; Z raise
 G1 X5 Y80 F3000 ; go to parking pos.
 M109 S{material_print_temperature_layer_0}   ; wait for hot end temperature to reach e.g. 210 Â°C
 M106 S0; fan off
 SET_LED LED=WS2812 RED=0.18 GREEN=0 BLUE=0.20 ; color Purple
 G29 ; Level bed; Activate bed leveling compensation
 SET_LED LED=WS2812 RED=0.2 GREEN=0.1 BLUE=0 ; color Orange - printing color
 G4  P1000 ; wait a second
 ; prime nozzle
 G1 X30 Y1 F7200 ; move to start
 G1 Z0.3 F800 ; Move to layer height
 G1 X130 Y1 E20 F800 ; print prime line
 G1 X130 Y2 F7200 ; move to start
 G1 X30 Y2 E40 F800 ; print prime line
 SET_SKEW XY=142.72,140.8,100.3

machine_end_gcode.default_value:
SET_LED LED=WS2812 RED=0.1 GREEN=0.35 BLUE=0 ; finished printing Green
 M104 S0
 M140 S0
 ;Retract the filament
 G92 E1
 G1 E-1 F80
 SET_SKEW CLEAR=1
 G1 X5 Y90 F3000
 G91
 G1 Z20 F600
 G1 Z20 F600
 G1 Z20 F600
 G1 Z20 F600
 G90
 M84
 G4  P1000 ; wait a second
 SET_LED LED=WS2812 RED=0.1 GREEN=0.1 BLUE=0.1 ; defaule white
